mapper.insert: insert into trans_info (id, debit_account_no, credit_account_no, trans_amount, currrncy, trans_code, sub_trans_code, trans_dt, out_date, order_no, recon_inst , operator_id, gmt_create) values (#{id}, #{debitAccountNo}, #{creditAccountNo}, #{transAmount}, #{currency}, #{transCode}, #{subTransCode}, #{transDT}, #{outDate}, #{orderNo}, #{reconInst}, #{operatorID} , NOW())
